greenhouse.notes: Either candidateId or candidate object required

lever.notes: lastName is not honored by lever API

workday_ats.notes: Fields Not Supported: answers, attachment, candidate.title, candidate.company, candidate.workAddress, and candidate.permanentAddress. In metaData, countryCodeId field is required.

successfactors_ats.notes: initialStageId is not honored. candidate.presentAddress.country field is required if passing candidate object.

workable.notes: Creating an application via candidateId is not supported. candidate object is required

breezy.notes: Creating an application via candidateId is not supported. candidate object is required

sage_ats.notes: Creating an application via candidateId is not supported. candidate object is required

ukgpro_ats.notes: initialStageId is not honored. Need to pass additional fields inside metaData key.

keka_ats.notes: Creating an application via candidateId is not supported. initialStageId is not honored pass any dummy string.

zoho_recruit.notes: initialStageId is not honored, pass dummy string

bamboohr_ats.notes: Creating an application via candidateId is not supported. candidate object is required. initialStageId is not honored.

loxo.notes: Creating an application via candidateId is not supported. candidate object is required. initialStageId is not honored. lastName is not honored - pass full name in firstName. metaData should contain resume details (compulsory).

pinpoint.notes: Creating an application via candidateId is not supported. candidate object is required
